text: Winnica () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Krotoszyce, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately south-west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 320. ==References== Winnica
title: Winnica, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
